name: Scrap Yard
description:
This game was made in roughly 5 days for a game jam. It only has one short level with a few enemies and a fairly difficult boss fight. While this game itself will never be updated, I plan to expand on the general idea and core mechanics in future games.

Music: 

  • Dystopia- Composed by Per Kiilstofte
  • Calm Before the Storm- Composed by Aaron Spencer

Art:

  • All of the art used was made by me
